title: 756: BITCOIN AND CRYPTO MARKET WILL SURGE 100X AMID LIGHTNING SPEED ADOPTION, SAYS MACRO GURU RAOUL PAL!!
description:
Raoul Pal says Bitcoin and Crypto is on the verge of exponential growth as the space sees lightning-fast adoption.

“Right now, it’s a $2.5 trillion asset class. Most of the major asset classes around the world, equities, bonds, real estate, are between $150-$350 trillion, so I think this goes to $200 trillion in the next 10 years, so that’s a 100x for an asset class."

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
